sentence: In the Senate, black Republicans like Herschel Walker and Richard Irvin are competing in GOP primaries to challenge incumbent Democrats.
author: WND News Services
title: GOP steps up recruitment efforts for black candidates and voters

sentence: This intellectually lazy, vile and hate-filled hit piece on Herschel Walker demeans Black excellence and contributes to the Democrat Partys divisive ideology that all Black people are monolithic.
author: Wesley Hunt
title: The rise of Black conservatives is breaking the left
